title: Didn't get a mastery token for an S game
body: Last night I played an ARAM game with Singed, who I am mastery 5 with. I had a pretty good game even though we lost, dealing over 100k damage, and ended up getting an S. It gave me a chest since I hadn't gotten one on him, but not a mastery token. I was already at mastery 5 heading into the game, so I don't know why I didn't get one.

replies.body: Sorry for the confusion here, tokens are currently only available on Summoner's Rift.  More info on our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide, but you did a hell of a job.  Keep it up!

I've gotten s and s- on summoners rift and gotten no tokens with a full 5 champ trying to get 6 and a full 6 champ trying to get mastery 7. :/
Those marks can be hard to get so I hope it isn't random if you get the token or not and that score. Also, I feel like riot should extend it to where people can get them from the other maps and modes too. A good score comes with work no matter the mode or map.
